resources.string: Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested
Access to the camera is needed for detection
This application cannot run because it does not have the camera permission. The application will now exit.
Ocr dependencies cannot be downloaded due to low device storage

About:\n ReadMe was coded for Hack@Brown 2020 by Jason Ho, Jeremy Chen, Joe Han and Steven Cheung. \n The purpose of the app is to combine existing technologies into an accessibility tool for those with dyslexia or visual impairment. ReadMe serves as a general visual aid through its implementation of Google cloud services like OCR and Firebase text recognition to enhance images of text.
